resourceTemplates.name: team-channels
resourceTemplates.title: Get team channels
resourceTemplates.description: Lists all standard and shared channels within a specific Team, including their names and descriptions.

resourceTemplates.name: channel-messages
resourceTemplates.title: Get channel messages
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves the most recent 20 messages from a specified channel in a Team.

resourceTemplates.name: team-members
resourceTemplates.title: Get team members
resourceTemplates.description: Lists all members of a specified Team with their names, user IDs, email addresses, and roles.

resourceTemplates.name: channel-messages-by-date
resourceTemplates.title: Get channel messages by date
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves messages from a specified channel in a Team within a given date range.

resourceTemplates.name: message-replies
resourceTemplates.title: Get message replies
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves replies to a specific message in a channel.

resourceTemplates.name: channel-tabs
resourceTemplates.title: Get channel tabs
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves the list of tabs (like Planner, OneNote, etc.) configured in a specific Teams channel.

resourceTemplates.name: search-groups
resourceTemplates.title: Search groups
resourceTemplates.description: Search a list of Microsoft 365 groups on display name by search query.

resourceTemplates.name: search-users
resourceTemplates.title: Search users
resourceTemplates.description: Search a list of Microsoft 365 users by search query

resourceTemplates.name: calendar-view-period
resourceTemplates.title: Get calendar view (period)
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves all calendar events for a group (team) within a specific date range. Returns all events between startDateTime and endDateTime.

resourceTemplates.name: calendar-events-filter-by-start-date
resourceTemplates.title: Get calendar events by start date
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves all calendar events for a group (team) that start on or after the specified date/time. Use ISO 8601 format for the date/time.
